mapper.select: SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT G.*, D.FILE_NAME AS goodsFileName FROM T_SHOPPING_GOODS G INNER JOIN T_GOODS_DETAIL_IMAGE D ON G.GOODS_ID = D.GOODS_ID AND D.FILE_TYPE = 'main_image' AND G.GOODS_STATUS = #{goodsStatus} ORDER BY G.GOODS_CREDATE DESC) T WHERE ROWNUM < 9

SELECT * FROM T_GOODS_DETAIL_IMAGE WHERE FILE_TYPE != 'main_image' AND GOODS_ID = #{goodsId}
